mapper.select: SELECT assignment_exam_no assignmentExamNo ,login_id loginId ,assignment_file_name assignmentFileName ,assignment_file_origin_name assignmentFileOriginName ,assignment_file_type assignmentFileType ,assignment_file_size assignmentFileSize ,assignment_file_create_date assignmentFileCreateDate FROM assignment_file WHERE assignment_exam_no = #{assignmentExamNo} AND login_id = #{loginId}
